fields.value: Recidivism Among Convicted Drunk Drivers:  Minnesota, 1982

authorName.value: Minnesota Criminal Justice System Driving While Intoxicated Task Force

authorAffiliation.value: Minnesota Criminal Justice System Driving While Intoxicated Task Force

dsDescriptionValue.value: This data collection focuses on recidivism among persons convicted for driving while intoxicated. It contains information about the charging and sentencing of drunk driving offenders and repeat offenders. Variables include charge, conviction, sentence, number of alcohol and non-alcohol related violations, subsequent action, sex, age, and date of sentencing.

topicClassValue.value: ICPSR XVII.E. Social Institutions and Behavior, Crime and the Criminal Justice System
NACJD XI. Drugs, Alcohol, and Crime

value: All persons convicted of driving while intoxicated in the State of Minnesota.

fields.value: Defendants were selected on the basis of those convicted   and sentenced to serve time in the county jail and those convicted and  sentenced to probation or fine.
